•	the Presbyterian Church
•	the Methodist Church
•	the Church of Ireland
•	the Irish Council of Churches
•	Trócaire.

The delegation met with:
•	Minister Alan Kelly, Minister for the Environment
•	Mr David Walsh, Assistant Secretary, Department of the Environment
•	Mr John O’Neill, Climate Section, Department of the Environment
•	Minister Mark H. Durkan, NI Minister for the Environment,
•	Ms. Mary Bunting, Special Adviser to Minister Durkan.
